Hypothesis : The use new outcome assessment tool box allow sensitive information effect ACTs stable adult patient CF current gold standard measure . This randomise control cross-over trial involve adult cystic fibrosis ( CF ) patient Royal Brompton Hospital , London . Participants control . Each participant attend research facility two visit .
